Features¶

SOAP feature module for defining MDT features.

class feature.feature(features, mlib=None)[source]¶

Define the features for calcualting statistics from structures :Parameters:

  • features: the string representation of features, mini language:

    features => feature [,features] feature => type, number of bins, #, range, [,#, start value] #start value will be zero if not defined

Example:

features='d30#15'# 0-30A, 0.5 bin size

Types are from MDT:

Previous topic

Decoys

Next topic

Calcualte statistics from a set of structures
